text: Sebulan yang lalu saya menginap dan meeting selama seminggu penuh di sini. Salah satu hotel dengan hospitality terbaik. Pelayanan selama meeting juga sangat cekatan, segala macam request dipenuhi walaupun saya sadar kadang requestnya agak mendadak dan aneh2. Tapi sangat senang karena akang2 di lantai 2 yg waktu itu membantu kami sangat ramah dan cekatan. Yang lebih saya suka makanannya. Semua makanannya enak, dan yg mengagetkan di hari terakhir saya sampe nambah sup tomyum nya. Saya juga sangat sangat terkesan ketika saya ambil coffee break dan bergumam “oh risol, saya kira sosis solo” kemudian besok nya benar2 diwujudkan sosis solo. Mungkin sepele tp itu sangat berkesan.  Bahkan client tidak ragu untuk bungkus snack yg waktu itu dihidangkan dan kebetulan disediakan lebih. Terimakasih, kesan saya sangat baik dan puas untuk seminggu bekerja di Bandung khususnya artotel de Braga. Pasti saya akan rekomendasikan dan kembali ke sini lagi.

text:
Saya menginap di lantai 11 hotel de Braga pada bulan November 2022 selama 3 malam. Saat itu saya dan rekan kantor mendapat tugas visitasi ke kota Kembang ini. Sempat kesulitan mencari penginapan yang sesuai dengan keinginan masing-masing. Akhirnya dapat rekomendasi hotel ini. 
Sempat khawatir, karena ketua tim sudah tiba di lokasi, sedangkan saya belum tiba dipenginapan. Untunglah konfirmasi ke FO tidak sulit, jadi beliau bisa langsung istirahat karena memang sudah menjelang malam. Untuk kamar sangat bersih, dengan pemandangan kota Bandung. Menu sarapan sangat bervariasi dan enak, terutama untuk croissantnya. Selain itu lokasi sangat strategis. Untuk yang suka kuliner, atau sekedar ngopi atau berkumpul bersama teman banyak pilihan yang dapat ditempuh dengan berjalan kaki. Terima kasih untuk pelayanan pihak hotel. Saya dan rekan-rekan merasa sangat nyaman selama stay di de Braga. Dan ketua tim kami merekomendasikan untuk menginap di hotel de Braga, jika sedang tugas ataupun liburan ke kota ini.

text:
Ketika kami tiba, petugas front office hanya ada 1, entah apakah pada saat itu sedang jam istirahat. Tapi staff memberikan saya opsi kamar yang terbaik, karena kebetulan kami tiba jam 12 siang jadi belum saatnya masuk kamar. 
Begitu kami tiba di kamar, kamarnya nyaman sekali. Begitu melihat tempat tidurnya, saya belum pernah menginap di hotel yang tempat tidurnya yang selebar ini. Kami bisa tidur bertiga dengan anak kami yang berusia 9 tahun. Kamar mandi bersih, hanya sayang ada sedikit bau-bauan, entah dari saluran air atau darimana. Air panas stabil, wifi kencang, lantainya pun bersih. Menurut saya, penggunaan coffe maker seperti itu, malah sedikit menyusahkan. Ditambah staff hotel harus mengedukasi tamu tentang penggunaannya. Mau di tempatkan di kamar manapun, view-nya bagus semua, karena saya ambil lebih dari 1 kamar, jadi bisa lihat semua view.
Sengaja kami ambil hotel ini, karena ingin mendekat ke pusat keramaian di Asia Afrika & Braga. Dan ternyata tepat pilihan saya. Mau kemana mana tinggal jalan kaki. Tidak disarankan menginap disana apabila kalau malam mau, sering pergi membawa mobil dan ingin terburu buru, karena kondisi jalannya yang macet sekali. Menginap disana lebih enak wisata jalan kaki. Nongkrong malam di Cafe B10 seperti kita ada di Bali. Asli enak banget.
Sore itu saya menemani anak saya berenang, disayangkan kolam renangnya terbilang kecil. Kurang kursi-kursi untuk yang duduk. Tidak terbayang apabila keadaan sedang penuh. Tapi pada saat itu, karena kami memang ingin berjalan2 kaki diseputaran Asia Afrika & Braga, jadi tidak terlalu menjadi masalah.
Paket yang saya ambil dari travel online ternyata mendapat 2 hidangan per kamar. Menunya paket Sei Sapi dan Paket Chicken Katsu. Enak semua makanannya, jadi bukan hanya sekedar saja. 
Waktunya sarapan, kami sengaja duduk diluar sembari menikmati udara pagi. Untuk kelas bintang 4, variasi makanan tidak terlalu banyak, seperti misalnya salad. Untuk bintang 4 biasanya ada cold cuts dan keju, tapi disana tidak tersedia. Tapi masih dimaklumi karena biar tidak terlalu banyak variasinya, tapi rasanya enak semua. Dibuat dengan sepenuh hati, bukan hanya untuk mengisi meja saja. Croissant-nya emang juara banget. 

Overall, hotel ini sangat direkomendasikan, baik secara pelayanan, fasilitas dan juga lokasinya.

Thanks de Braga by Artotel!!! 😘Desain kamar sangat artistik, cukup luas, bersih dan penerangan cukup (tidak terlalu gelap). Di kamar hanya tersedia 1 pasang sandal jepit dari hotel, lalu saya request untuk penambahan 1 pasang lagi.. tapi sandal jepit yg dikirim ke kamar saya lama sekali hampir sejam... Untuk breakfast enak rasanya dan banyak variannya, tapi makanan khas Bandung kok tidak ada ya?? Kolam renangnya cukup luas. Lokasi de Braga sangat strategis, dekat dengan jalan Braga dan alun2 Bandung... jadi tinggal jalan kaki aja dari hotel... Next Time ke Bandung saya akan staycation di de Braga by Artotel lagi...😍👍🏼

GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
De Braga Artotel

Langsung aja saya ulas yah..

-Lokasi
Lokasi yang strategis sangat membantu saya kalau mau kemana2. Letaknya di dekat Museum Konfrensi Asia Afrika dan Jl.Braga, bisa kita tempuh dengan jalab kaki kalau mau ke Alun Alun kota bandung.
Ini salah satu keuntungnya kalau stay disini.

-Lobby
Lobby nya unik, berasa kaya masuk ke kantor mejanya haha, dan itu luas lho lobby nya, servicenya cepet banget. Dan tidak diminta deposit juga, mungkin karna saya sudah payment di travel agent, tapi ga tau juga si pokoknya ga diminta deposit aja hehe..

-Lift
Lift nya ada 2, dan itu cepet banget walaupun kita ada di Lt.14. Oh iya, hotel ini tidak menganut mitos2 yang tidak boleh ada angka 3,4,13 dll.. semua nomor lantai ada hehe. Liftnya juga cukup juga menampung sekitar 8 orang.

-Kamar
Saya pilih studio 25, kamarnya kecil tapi saya suka. Art di kamarnya pun juga bisa buat ajang foto2 haha.. dan ada 1 sisi temboknya warna hitam polos, makin narsis lah buat foto2 di kamar hahaha..
Di kamar mandinya, menurut saya kurang di berikan sabun cuci tangan (sabun batang kecil at least), handbody & cotton bud. Itu si kurangnya. Dan handuk mandinya saya suka banget, ga berat gitu.. beda dari hotel2 pada umumnya handuknya berat2 dan cenderung kasar. Tapi kl handuk disini tuh lembut, saya suka..

-Breakfast Lt.3
Nah makan pagi disini sebetulnya cukup enak. Cuma kurang variasi makanannya, western food nya juga ga ada di hari pertama, baru hari kedua pun juga cuma sosis dan macaroni aja. Makanan indo nya pun terbilang biasa aja si menurut saya untuk ukuran 4* yah..
Ada tempat di outdoor nya juga lho, bagus deh.. cuma sayang hanya dikasi 2 meja makan saja.
Lalu klau mau buat merokok juga ada lgi tempatnya. 

-Swimming Pool Lt.3
Swimming pool nya 1 lantai dengan tempat breakfast yah, kolamnya tidak cukup besar, tapi oke untuk berenang hehe

-Bar/Cafe
Ini nih yang saya dan suami saya suka, malem minggu nongkrong ga usah jauh2, di Lobby depannya ada bar dan live music juga lho. Harga makanan dan minuman terjangkau. Ga heran malem minggu full yang dtg. Plus yang lagi macet2an dapet hiburan gratis dengerin si teteh nya nyanyi hehe.

NB : Make Up Room tidak bisa di lakukan di jam malam. Karna biasanya saya make up room itu kalau malam masih bisa di hotel lain. Cuma gpp ini sudah SOP dan saya menghargainya. At leat mereka mau membersihkan sampah dan berikan air mineral baru saja. 

Ini ulasan saya mengenai De Braga Artotel.
Sukses terus..

Xoxo

text:
Kami tinggal 1 malam dan bertepatan dengan peringatan "Hari Veteran" yang berlangsung dari pagi dan puncak malam jam 19.30. Acara berlangsung 1 September, pas di depan jalanan hotel. Akibatnya, mobil harus bergilir untuk masuk ke hotel. Hotel vintage karena masih mempertahankan exterior lama namun bagian dalam hotel sudah di renovasi sesuai dengan standart hotel yang dipenuhi lukisan/art. Kamar tidur yang nyaman dengan pemandangan kota Bandung serta kolam renang dengan background kubah mesjid. 

Untuk mencari makan tidak masalah, semuanya bisa ditempuh dengan berjalan kaki. Keluar lobby hotel, kearah kanan : banyak ditemukan cafe-cafe. Kearah kiri, jalan melewati 2 lampu merah bisa ketemu Sudirman Street dan Cibadak yang saat ini sedang terkenal, kuliner. Ada yang halal dan non halal.

text: Hotel bintang 4 di jalan Braga menjadikan hotel ini pilihan untuk santai sejenak saat weekend. Pemandangan bangunan lama sekitar Braga membawa pengunjung merasakan Bandung heritage.Pelayanan nya super ramah baik dr security-nya sampai housekeeping. Proses check in cepat, tidak ada 5 menit reception sudah memberikan kunci kamarnya kepada saya. Saat weekend parkiran mobil penuh namun tidak perlu khawatir karena hotel ini menyediakan fasilitas valet (free). Anak usia dibawah 10 tahun masih gratis breakfastnya namun resto hotel imut sekali. Kolam renang ada buat anak dan dewasa. Dan yang perlu di adjust oleh artotel adalah kebersihan jalanan dari kolam renang ke toilet ganti  karena lantai basah dan licin. Lantai yang basah tidak segera di pel sehingga bisa berbahaya untuk anak kecil.

text:
Saya ingat ketika saya mencari hotel di daerah Bandung pada Agustus 2018 lalu. Dan akhirnya memutuskan untuk menginap di hotel De Braga by Artotel. Jika bicara Artotel sudah jelas bahwa bakalan banyak grafiti dengan konsep hotel yang tidak konvensional. Saya suka baju karyawannya. 

Pagi sebelum saya check in, saya dapat telpon dari hotel namun tidak sempat saya jawab. Ketika saya buka Whatsapp ternyata ada pesan juga dari hotel menanyakan apakah saya jadi menginap pada hari itu. 

Saya coba menelpon dan yang menjawab adalah Mbak Amel. Sama dengan yang mengirim pesan VIA Whatsapp. Dan pembicaraannya pun sama; apakah hari ini saya jadi datang? kira-kira jam berapa saya akan datang? menjelaskan tipe room apa yang saya order.

Saya tiba di hotel sekitar jam 1 siang. Menggunakan motor dan parkir di Basemant. Area parkir motor tidak banyak. Namun better than nothing, kan? 

RECEPTIONIST

Ketika check in, saya langsung diberi teh. Katanya teh Jawa Barat. Namun ada juga Bir Pletok dan beberapa pastries yang mereka sediakan diatas meja. Karyawannya ramah. 

Mbak nya ngasih tahu bahwa room dengan bed king size sudah habis. Maka saya akan diberikan twin bed namun akan disatukan. Saya tidak masalah. Saya disuruh untuk menunggu karena room mereka belum ready. 

Setelah menunggu hampir satu jam. Saya masih belum dipanggil. Saya perhatikan tamu-tamu yang datang setelah saya mendapatkan kamar terlebih dahulu. 

Akhirnya ketika saya bertanya ke mbak yang berbeda (karena mbak yang tadi saya check in udah enggak ada) ternyata room nya sudah ready. Mungkin karena ganti shift jadi file saya terlupakan. 

Karena beda orang saya bertanya apakah bed saya sudah disatukan? Dari twin menjadi (terlihat) king? Mbak nya bilang ia sudah.

Note; Perhatikan ketika akan bersandar di dinding area lobby. Anak saya bersandar di dinding dan bajunya menjadi putih karena cat. 

ROOM

Saya mendapatkan room 1010. Ketika masuk saya mendapatkan kamar yang bagus. Sesuai dengan ekspektasi. Ada coffee machine dan standard amenities. 

TV nya besar. Channel nya banyak. Bingung mau nonton apaan. Tidak ada sofa hanya ada kursi dan meja tentunya. Karena ini hotel baru, door knob masih ada plastik yang belum bersih. Tapi itu no big deal, lah. 

Dekorasi kamar bagus. Anak saya suka gambarnya. Ada wallpaper sama ada yang dilukis langsung di dinding. Kali ini kualitas cat di kamar tidak bikin baju anak saya kotor. He he he ...

Namun sangat disayangkan, saya mendapatkan twin bed saya belum disatukan oleh housekeeping. Saya coba konfimasi ke operator dan setelah 10 menit Mbak Amel nelpon balik dan bilang housekeeping attendant akan datang. Saya menunggu sekitar 15 menit dan sekitar 10 menit untuk menyatukan twin bed tersebut. Padahal saya check in jam 1 dan jam 2 lebih dapet kamar. Ada durasi 1 jam lebih untuk prepare. 

Saya bertanya sama Mas yang ngurusin kamar dia bilang ada sekitar 15 kamar yang minta digabung twin bed nya. Jadi saya pikir kamar twin lebih banyak daripada kamar yang memiliki king bed. Dan karena mereka belum memiliki jointer jadi single bed yang disatukan masih terasa. Namun saya akui kasurnya empuk. 

POOL END RESTO

Ketika saya menunggu untuk check in. Saya berkeliling dengan anak saya melihat area hotel. Meeting room ada di lantai 2 sedangkan pool dan resto ada di lantai 3. Pool sendiri tidak begitu besar. Towel disediakan di greeter desk resto depan elevator.

Ketika breakfast, area dekat pool ada stand fried egg. Istri saya mesen omelette. Dianterin ke table. 

Buffet tidak terlalu besar. Jadi variasi makanan ya ... tidak banyak. Bahkan saya sempet denger tamu lain bilang mendingan di hotel sebelah makanannya. Well, saya akui karena memang tidak banyak pilihannya. Saya setuju.

Untuk coffee kita harus minta sama Mbak nya karena gak ada di buffeet. Karena saya duduk di luar, pas Mbak nya ngasih coffee tanpa ngasih sugar jadi saya harus ambil sugar dari table yang ada di dalam. Cappuchino extra charge.

KESIMPULAN

Hotel De Braga by Artotel memiliki lokasi yang sangat strategis, deket kemana-mana. Ke Alun-Alun tinggal jalan kaki. 

Room nya bagus, minimalis dan kekinian. Bersih dan memiliki TV yang besar. WiFi lumayan kenceng. Bersih.

Kolam renang OK, lah.

Rasa makanan enak. Cuman vareasinya aja yang kurang. Klo breakfast jangan lupa cobain Croissant nya. Fabulous!

Karyawan nya pada ramah. 

Over all outstanding but still there is room to be improved.

text:
Finally, step by step the pandemic breakout is vanished. Indonesia is ready to welcoming tourist again. My first journey in this happy moment is Bandung, and I choose de Braga for my home away from home. Located in a heritage surrounding Braga street, famous with heritage buildings. Check-in process was very fast. Our room was excellent, with clean linen, king size bed, spacious room, nice bathroom with hot water running freely and also WiFi is very fast. 
We were expected our pillows was big and fluffy (just like the pictures in the hotel website) but we found only a normal size pillows and not so fluffy also. 
They provided complimentary tea and sugar but the room was not equipped with hot water kettle, only the coffee machine without the user manual. 
Surrounded with many food vendors made us easy to found our meals during our stay. 
We enjoyed our stay. See u at our next visit to Bandung

text:
The service is excellent. The staff are very nice in giving their services including the restaurant staff who delivered my requested breakfast to my room and their nice security guards who always give greeting when you go out or back to the hotel. 
And I love the room so much. Is it the smallest (Studio 25)? But it is spacey with twin beds, big window which gave me a nice view from 13th floor, and no complaint with the cleanliness of the beds and bathroom. Though there is no coffee maker in the room (which I was hopping there is), but you can get a hot-water boiler to make your coffee/tea. And the most beloved is their 3-leg power sockets in the room :) 
As a solo traveler, the location is excellent since there are walkable destinations you can explore--Braga city walk, Asia-Africa museum, Alun-Alun, etc. and walking distance food stalls (the ABC street). I am satisfied to stay for 4-nites @ De Braga by Artotle

text:
We stayed in De Braga Hotel by Artotel on Oct 17-18, 2020. We were a group of an extended family (with 2 children & a baby), booked 5 rooms.

Pros:
1. Thumbs up for Miss Eka (FO/Reservation). She has succeeded in fulfilling our requests regarding our rooms. All 5 rooms were on the same floor. The baby slept very well & didn't disturb other guests (😇). My family (2 parents & 2 children) did get the connecting rooms. We are really, really satisfied with the room assignments. Thank you very much, Miss Eka 😘
2. Excellent service, especially regarding the check in. Again, by Miss Eka 👍🏼 We (traveling from Jakarta) arrived at the Hotel at 11 am. Off course, the rooms were not ready so we dropped our luggages and proceed to lunch. At 2.15 pm Miss Eka called my mobile saying that our rooms were ready (which I highly appreciated!).
3. The location is very city-centric & strategic to most tourist attractions. Great value for money.
4. I liked (almost) everything about the room. The size was OK (not big but not too small either). The bed was PERFECT with 4 pillows, very comfortable for my backpain. I personally prefer no carpet, I can clearly see the floor was clean. I really loved the open "wardrobe", we could vigilantly check our things before departing (minimalized leaving behind our things). Plus, there was a big space to store our shoes.

Cons:
1. When my children & I went to the pool (on Saturday around 4 pm), the area was dirty and there were no staffs around. We found some cigarette butts & leftover food 🤦🏻‍♀️ I know it was done by some irresponsible guests, but that's why there should be a staff watching the area (to warn the naughty guests).
2. Breakfast time was a disappointment. I didn't mind about the long queue and I understood the staffs were doing their best. I even didn't mind about the average menu. However, for me the biggest flaw is: the food didn't match with the menu displayed on the TV screen. The staff said that it was yesterday's menu. So why did they even bother to turn on the TV that was displaying the wrong menu? 🤦🏻‍♀️
3. The dining chairs in the restaurant were heavy. It was a bit difficult for us to move them for standing & sitting on.
4. The shower head in room 8002 looked like it was going to fall off, and the pipe leaked. The faucet in room 8003 was wiggly. The electrical socket for the coffee maker/water heater (also in room 8002) didn't work.
5. The water heater (for drinking) was a high-end Nescafe coffee maker. But no coffee, only tea 🤭 And I think the Hotel should make an instruction manual on how to operate it, for not everybody is familiar with this kind of appliance (including me).
6. The Hotel was managed by Artotel, but it's interior looked like just a regular hotel. I think they should display much more art works so guests can do a selfie or take photos.

Overall, we really enjoyed our stay & would definitely recommend it for travelers who are looking for a hotel in the heart of Bandung. For families, the connecting rooms are highly recommended.
title: We loved our stay 🥰

text:
This hotel was chosen by the company. The first impression when you arrived with a taxi was confusing, because I got confused about the exit way came first than the hidden entrance. Before enter the lobby got held by the security for temperature check. When enter the lobby, your eyes are stunned by the layout of tiles, it went from the floor up to the wall. Nice industrial design lobby sofa (or chair). Front office lounge is very cool, so nice and comfy. Check in process was so fast, scanned the id and give you email and phone number, and they give you the keycard (i'm staying at rm 7001).

Elevator...they just elevator with security keycard tapping. But when you enter the room...wow! It is a small but beautiful room. Loved the minimalist design of clothes hanger, loved the wooden look tiles. Loved the art placed on the upper headboard. Beautiful lamp fixtures. Very nice work desk with chair. Welcome drink are served with Nescafe DolceGusto coffee machine and Earl Grey black tea.

En-suite is nice design. Cool subway tiles all around the wall, large mirror with granite single sink. No bathtub, but beautiful and comfortable shower glass and doors, provided with two tipes of shower, handheld and rain shower (never found in other hotels). Hot water always ready 24hrs, but in the sink they forgot to turn on cold water on, so it is very hot when you have to brush your teeth. Toilet provided with rear wash (the water not strong enough) and toilet paper.

Bedding great. Not too hard or too soft. Got two very nice pillow (love this). Blanket also works for bedcover. I got the twin bed.

Through the huge window you can see nearby hotel (Ibis) and part of Braga street all the way to the intersection. The window seal are tight but you still can hear the ambient sound from outside.

Breakfast meal served at the Bistro are superb. They provide various type of meals, western and traditional. And they taste great. The coffee here are great. They also provide outside dining table. Unfortunately I didn't had a chance to try swimming in the swimming pool connected with the Bistro.

I had an experienced with the troubled keycard, I can't open the room door, so I have to go back to the front office (twice) the get it fixed.

Overall : very good, I would love to come back to this hotel

*need to check water in the sink

text:
Stayed for 1 night on business purpose, this hotel is the new Gem in Braga. I am honestly not sure how long this hotel has been operated but since I just came back to Bandung after few years abroad, this place was my first choice. Sadly I had to go to Jakarta and only spent one night here however, I loved this hotel's atmosphere and ambiance, especially after the sun down. The cafe/bar on the first floor just right beside the famous Braga street played so many of my fav songs that I haven't heard in a while, not even when I was abroad.
The room was so-so, I forgot what type of room that I booked. Unfortunately all smoking room were reserved that day. Another cool thing of this hotel is the swimming pool is open till like.. really late. Later than the usual pool in a usual hotel that typically only opens until like 7-8 PM. I came down to chill by the pool (it's on the 3rd floor, along with their restaurant) at like 9.30ish pm.
Breakfast, also was so-so but I liked the girl on the egg corner (I forgot to ask her name). The scrambled egg she made was exactly the kind of scrambled egg that I like. Moist with lots of onion, and I didn't even tell her how I'd like my scrambled, ya know.
Big cheers to Kiki Darmadi and Wahyu Ramdani though. These guys are awesome! They gave excellent hospitality, super friendly and super helpful throughout my one night stay. They're the gem of this property.
I might consider getting back in the future and hoping to be able to spend more time in Bandung and especially in the cafe and hope they'd play more awesome music! Totally worth the money to stay here.
title: New Braga Gem

text: Super traffic reaching the hotel on Saturday night around 10pm, was stuck around 20 minutes just from the turn to enter the hotel (there were no officers who helped to regulate the traffic). Arrived at the hotel gate, they say parking area was full, valet is offered (the mood immediately gets worse because I imagined that I need to unload my luggage in front of the gate while carrying a child who has fallen asleep). Because I was super late check in, on the last day I requested late check out at 1pm because I wanted to pray for the dhuhr first, and they allowed maximum at 12:30. For me it;s bad gesture as I have to do my pray in rush. There is a shallow swimming pool for a toddler but unfortunately, it is not smoke-free. When we swam there was a group of smokers smoking in the pool lounge chairs. The room condition is in accordance with the photo, there are only a few dusty spots in the toilet. The choice of breakfast is not much, preferring culinary around the hotel if stay there again.
title: Super stuck traffic around the hotel

text:
My last friday stay in De Braga Hotel was perfect. The location was in the heart of Bandung City. It takes only 2 mins walks to enjoy the historical buildings among Jl. Asia Afrika. The design of the hotel was that pretyy and the most important was instagram-able. The first time stepping into my room, i was amazed by the wall-art. The room was so clean, spaceful, perfumed, and also artsy!!
The breakfast was delicious. There were so many choices you can have! Those sausages were my fav! 
Even you can try a mix of Jamu (an indonesian herb medicine). 
The water in the pool was that refreshing with a view of Mesjid Agung Bandung.
The last but not least was the staffs. Their uniforms were very eye-catching and fashionable and also they gave the best services during the my stay! Always smilling, helpful, and charming. 
I did really enjoy every seconds of my stay in De Braga Hotel by Artotel. Pretty sure will come back soon!
title: Perfect place to say in the heart of bandung.

text:
Bandung is like heaven on earth, where food, beautiful nature panorama, various exciting local attraction, clothes distro, combined in places

I booked accomodation in 28 sqm, 13th floor, with city view, smoking available, bathroom has available hot water for shower, standart amenities, coffee maker  and safe deposit box available

TV has complete various channel but poor of signal, breeze too often for favorite channel movie, like HBO, Fox Movies channel

in the room, the hotel management dont put Guest Comments form, but they call you straight asking if you had complaint for food after room service ordered or even anything, more like personal touch, they wilk handled right away, in my opinion this is a good way rather we have to write it down everything in one form

24 hours room service, the price is rather expensive but Nasi Goreng Kambing is outstanding

Breakfast at 3rd floor, 2 part indoor and outdoor, complete continental and local food

The Hotel's pool is also at 3rd floor, small but is okay for kidz

The Hotel has a coffee bar, located at hotel's entry, is best point
title: Good Location, Good Food, Good Crew

MAGNIFICENT! I would say. Love the hospitality.
The staffs are very nice they will ready for you 24hrs when you need them. 

The room! OMG I didn’t know that the room that I am staying is a Standard Room (because I am staying here with my friends, they are the one who booked the room). It is very comfortable, compare to other hotel Standard Room, it is indeed the biggest, or at least for me. I am able to sleep here without any pain in my body. 

The breakfast, I absolutely love it. My personal favorite or everyones favorite is Bubur Ayam Sambal Matah (Chicken Porridge with Sambal Matah). The Porridge itself is already tasty, you don’t need to put ANY salt and pepper at all! Overall, it is a great experience! You have to try it yourself! The price also affordable! 

Thanks to Eka, Thassya and Raffi that make the experience remarkable! 

(My apologies, No picture, because the stay is so enjoyable and I forget about it, here it’s the view from our room (BEAUTIFUL city view) and a little bit sneak peek!

text:
I was very satisfied staying at this hotel mainly because of its location. It's in the old town of Bandung, right between the classic Braga and historical Asia-Africa street. Braga offered art vendors, street musicians, cafes (hence heavy traffic at night especially on weekend). While Asia-Africa was so vibrant with people especially in the evening. Some of them dressed in cosplay as urban legends and super heroes to attract others. Along the road were old buildings that properly preserved by the government. Just 10 minutes walk to Alun-alun (city square) where people gather with family on stretched artificial greens.
It's few minutes drive to other main tourist destinations such as Dago, Riau street, etc. (beware of traffic though).
Room was descent size, clean and neat. Bed was quite comfortable so I can sleep well. Staffs were very friendly. Breakfast needs to be improved and variety to be added.

text:
Booked two (2) rooms Studio 25 for two (2) nights at de Braga by Artotel which is located at Braga street near many restaurants/cafes nearby, this hotel is perfect for family. The room is spacious with large window showing the city view, and we requested the interconnecting rooms for convenience and bigger space.
However, both rooms must be in same type, either twin-beds or double-bed, subject to rooms availability while check-in at the counter.
The lobby is nice with modern-concept and minimalist. Some arts hanging on the wall, and there is small lounge right next to the receptionist and fashion boutique.
The check-in process is very quick, and the reception staffs are helpful, so is the concierge while we ask to store our luggages since the rooms were not ready yet (around 1 p.m.).
What surprise us the most was, there is Dolce Gusto coffee maker provided in each room, free 2 bottles of mineral water, coffee/tea, and international tv channels.
Unfortunately there is no electric kettle provided, using the Dolce Gusto for boiling the water was confusing.
The bed is comfort, so are pillows.
We all had very good sleep.
The breakfast is various from fried rice/noodle, vegetables, meats, sausage, porridge, toasted bread, cakes/muffin, salad, and fruits. Each table is given choice of eggs, by requesting the staff to make it for you.
However, the number of seatings are limited. The pool is located on the same floor with the restaurant, quite small but enough for kids and family to spend the day. The parking lot is provided off-street and inside the hotel area.
I have nothing much to complain about this hotel. New, location, comfort, variety of breakfast menu, and hospitality from hotel staff are the main reason that I will definitely come back to this hotel.
title: Recommended hotel for family in Bandung!

text:
Managed by Artotel network, De Braga preserve its signature as a boutique hotel, where every room is a piece of art.

I stayed for three nights at their deluxe room. The view from the 12th floor was amazing. It’s strategically located in the historic quarter of Braga street, the center of Art Deco architectural buildings. The city square, grand mosque and rows of cafes and night life are within 10 min walking distance.

The hotel itself offers a beautiful outdoor pool and a small gym, good enough to stretch our body in the morning.

At night the street side coffe shop adjacent to the hotel lobby is a great place to hangout, while overlooking the crowd of Braga’s passerby. 

Over the weekend nights, occasionally they hold a car-free night where street performers and bazaar were filling up the street sides with full of festivity.

Overall, it was a great experience staying in this hotel, and would definitely come back for more!
title: The Best of Braga

text: Dear travellers, De Braga Hotel is located in the center of Bandung city with very good view of many popular streets and cultural heritages. It is in in Braga street, the most popular street in Bandung with culinary, shoppings, old buildings that makes it the most famous area in the city and loved by millenial generation. This De Braga Hotel is inside with the same compact-building with Sarinah shopping mall with new rooms, paintings, and simple-modern concept look. Really good for young professionals. The room is not so big but enough for 2 people. If you have time to go to Bandung, I recommend you this hotel, only Rupiah 818.170 or USD 56.5 per night including Breakfast. They also offer company deals including Dinner, if you have events related to work.

text:
Stayed at 1002, 1003 connecting room and another room was 1010 with 5 other friends recently. 
The hotel is easily missed if you do not pay attention when looking for it, not far from where the statue of BRAGA is. Conveniently located in a busy street with lots of food vendors in the area.
Greeted by friendly, professional and helpful staffs, check in was a breeze with no hassle whatsoever. Bravo!
The room is modern minimalist style with wall art on two of the walls. The bedroom was clean, all the amenities were properly stocked and drinking water supply were enough.
However the bathroom has a lot of men's curly hair everywhere. Seems like the housekeeper missed to clean the shower, too. There were a big blue marked (maybe from the cleaning agent) on the wall in the shower....I tried spraying it but it won't go away.
So, anyways.....the shower water pressure is good, soap and shampoo were adequate, and hair dryer was there.
Keep up with the upkeep, this hotel is worth it. But if they are messing around with the cleanliness standards it will easily goes downhill.

Oh one more thing since this hotel is pretty new the strong 'new' smell, be it came from paint, furniture or glue is quite strong as you enter.

But overall I would recommend this place to stay.
title: New chic hotel with potential.

text:
We stayed for a night and it was a great experience. All the things we requested got checked from the list: room on high-floor, large bed, and early check-in and late check-out so we were very happy. Also, the staffs were friendly and helpful. 

Our room was more spacious than expected, with a great view of Asia Afrika street from our window. The room was nicely designed in contemporary style with a hint of rustic industrial and a touch of art-deco. Murals on the wall were my favourite part of the room, making a great photo background. The TV and the bed were big. WiFi was reliable and fast for work. The bathroom was equipped with a marble sink (which made it look stylish and classy), hair dryer, and a rain shower. 

We got to swim in the pool the next morning and it was nice. However, the pool area needs more chairs. The rooftop garden by the restaurant also made a great place to hangout with friends. Overall, the experience was amazing and we are looking forward to staying at de Braga again.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Small room. Comfortable bed (King Koil), Grohe rain shower, unfortunately the bathroom is small or maybe the shower booth too big.

Nescafe dolce gusto a nice addition, unfortunately they don't equipped with traditional water boiler. So even for tea, the hot water u gotta get it from the Krups dolce gusto machine (quite annoying).

Ordered room service. Food is a complete disaster. Even club sandwich almost can't be eat. They tried to look 'cool' using one of those crusty French style bread but unfortunately the quality not so nice that made the ensemble of the sandwich a complete disaster.

Even traditional nasi goreng not so nice. It's damn salty and I can only taste salty rather than other herbs and spices. 

Overall.... the hotel itself is just ok. Awesome location. Is in the heart of the city with bunch of heritage buildings. I would say this hotel suited for business people rather than for family.
title: New hotel with awesome location

text:
This is new hotel in Bandung, not all facilities and room complete although already grand opening on August 2018, less variance of food for breakfast, very helpful staff,  good wifi, you will get 1 key room, and very good location although in peak hour got traffic jam. Room design was nice with industrial concept and a little touch of art. The special in the room was coffee maker by Dolce Gusto, but you will get a little noisy from this machine when you operate it 😁
Dine in the taste was so so and less variance menus, probably haven't ready yet 😀

But...you will get nice experience if you stay in here, 'cos a lot of location that you can explore such as culinary, Merdeka Building, and much more spot to taking picture.
Hopefully next visit will get better than this.

text:
Das de Braga liegt wie der Name vermuten lässt in der Braga Street, einer der top Flaniermeilen in Bandung.
Vom Hotel aus gelangt man ebenfalls in wenigen Minuten zu Fuss ins Zentrum, den Alun Alun von Bandung.
Trotzdem ist man in der Anlage weitestgehend von Lärm geschützt. Die Anlage ist modern und gepflegt.
Das Personal ist wie überall in Indonesien sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Das Frühstücksangebot ist abwechslungsreich und reichhaltig, überwiegend indonesische Küche, täglich frisch zubereitet.
Das Frühstück wird in der Zeit von 6 - 10 Uhr bereitgestellt, Check out bis 12 Uhr. Sehr flexibel ohne Stress.
Die kostenlose Wifi-Versorgung im Hotel ist ausgezeichnet und unkompliziert nutzbar. Das habe ich in Indonesien auch schon anders erlebt.
Das Hotel verfügt über einen schönen und gepflegten Pool.
Ich habe eine ganze Woche im de Braga verbracht, werde auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.
title: Sehr komfortables Hotel im Zentrum von Bandung

owner_response.text:
Hi roupiz,

Thanks for staying with us at de Braga by ARTOTEL, Bandung.

Glad to know that you like the hotel; the product and services we provided. The hotel itself was opened last year in Aug 2018. We put our effort to keep the hotel always fresh just like when it was opened. Yes, the location is at city center and Braga street is always the area the people must visit when they are in Bandung. It'is a walking distance to city square (Alun Alun) and surrounded by historical buildings, cafes, restaurants and so on.

Well, a part from the hotel, Braga is the place where you can explore many activities .

We thank you for your positive comment and look forward to have you back again to de Braga hotel, Bandung, in the near future.

Cheers,

Anton
